name: CATOPIA (ArcaCrema, Ciclopenteno, Alejandro GSainz)
description:
Submitted for PB GameJam 7, Theme: Utopia

STORY

Grandma was sad. She could see how society was in declive, abandoning the most precious animals to live in the street, with no food or shelter.

That had to change, and to achieve a perfect world, she had to take matters into her own hands...

AUTHORS

Alejandro García Sainz - Art, Music and Level Design

Pablo Gónzalez Polanco - Game Concept and Game Design

Fernando Gueler Berdasco - Code and Level Design

CONTROLS

Spacebar - Jump

R - Retry

Esc - Quit to Menu

*In Menus:      Spacebar - Next         Esc - Quit

SCREENSHOTS
